sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"推断"之意。
means: infer ： 指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
deduce ： 指有充分根据的推论，也指逻辑学上的演绎。
conclude ： 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
gather ： 指从听到的情况推测、判定。
judge ： 多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。

sentence.Network_en: Can we deduce from your silence that you do not approve?
sentence.Network_cn: 你保持沉默，我们是否可以据此而推断出你不赞成？

sentence.Network_en: The police were able to deduce where the fugitive was hiding.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方成功地推断出那逃亡者躲藏的地方.

sentence.Network_en: We can deduce a conclusion from the premise.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以从这个前提推出结论.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'lead or convey'): from Latin deducere, from de- 'down' + ducere 'lead'

entry.def: If you deduce something or deduce that something is true, you reach that conclusion because of other things that you know to be true.

example.ex: Alison had cleverly deduced that I was the author of the letter.
example.tran: 艾莉森已经聪明地推断出那封信就是我写的。

example.ex: The date of the document can be deduced from references to the Civil War...
example.tran: 这份文件的日期可以从其中多次提到内战之处进行推断。

means.word_mean: 1. reason by deduction; establish by deduction

auth_sentence.content: From that...I deduce that you are a painter in oils.
auth_sentence.res_content: From that...I deduce that you are a painter in oils.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From that...I deduce that you are a painter in oils.

auth_sentence.content: Ye case once graunted, ye deduce your conclusion very surelye.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ye case once graunted, ye deduce your conclusion very surelye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ye case once graunted, ye deduce your conclusion very surelye.

auth_sentence.content: Science can not scientificaly deduce that science has all the answers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science can not scientificaly deduce that science has all the answers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science can not scientificaly deduce that science has all the answers.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
stems_affixes.word_buile: deduce[v.[from]演绎,推断,推论]+tion表名词→n.演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
induce[v.引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应]+ment具体物→n.引诱物
pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
produce的名词化→生产出的东西
de向下+duce引导,带来→向下引→推论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+duce引导,带来→引进去→诱导

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产,制造,显示,演出,导致

re回+duce引导,带来→往回引→减少
tra横+duce引导,带来→向横引→不正→诽谤

sentences.en: On the basis of evidence we deduced that he was guilty.
sentences.cn: 根据这些证据我们推断他是有罪的。

sentences.en: Because there was no cloud, he deduced that it was going to be a cold night.
sentences.cn: 由于天上无云, 他推断夜晚会很寒冷。

sentences.en: The police were able to deduce where the fugitive was hiding.
sentences.cn: 警方成功地推断出那逃亡者躲藏的地方。

jushi.english: On the basis of evidence we deduced that he was guilty.
jushi.chinese: 根据这些证据我们推断他是有罪的。

jushi.english: Because there was no cloud, he deduced that it was going to be a cold night.
jushi.chinese: 由于天上无云,他推断将会有一个寒冷的夜晚。

jushi.english: The police were able to deduce where the fugitive was hiding.
jushi.chinese: 警方成功地推断出那逃亡者躲藏的地方。
